EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.WashingtonDC_Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Analytics Innovation Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Analytics Innovation Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Washington, DC. We look forward to seeing you.
Date: Wednesday, 19 April 2017
Time:
8:00am - 9:00am Breakfast 9:00am - 12:15pm Sessions 12:15pm - 1:15pm Lunch 1:15pm - 5:30pm Sessions
Location:
EMC EBC 8444 Westpark Drive, McLean, VA 22102 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/8444+Westpark+Dr,+McLean,+VA+22102/@38.9253861,-77.2384617,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x89b64af442c143f3:0x9d413431b541e06d!8m2!3d38.9253861!4d-77.236273]]>)
Parking:
Underground validated garage parking is available.
Agenda:
Review the full agenda HERE <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/washington-dc?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PAIR-2017]]>
If you have any questions, feel free to email Patrick Gillis at pgillis@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pgillis@pivotal.io]]>.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
